titleStmt.title: The city of London, as it was before the burning of St. Pauls ste[eple]
titleStmt.author: Godet, Giles.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Giles Godet by STC (2nd ed.).
The steeple of St. Paul's Cathedral burned in 1561.
Title on banner within illustration: Civitas Londinum.
Imperfect: creased, cropped and torn, with loss of part of title and picture.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
